title: Spring Frost
description: Spring Frost is the highly-anticipated seventh book in the epic romantic fantasy The Frost Series, about beautiful but dangerous fey saved by a human girl destined to unite all the factions of a warring land and become Queen of all Feyland. As Feyland slowly recovers from the darkness that had threatened Feyland itself, a greater danger arise forcing Breena to make an impossible choice.
author: Kailin Gow
